FeaturesGeneral.heading: One ecosystem. Many revenue streams.
points: Earn yield by trading meme coins with AI agents.
Receive blockchain-powered salary payouts with built-in staking.
Contribute compute and get paid for privacy-first processing.

features.Hyper 0x: A DEX combining AMM + Order Book engines with wallet and AI agents to auto-trade meme trends across platforms like Pump.fun and Radium.
features.Ox Pay: A blockchain-led banking solution with CRM + HRMS to power global payroll, tax, and employee payments with minimal fees.
features.Hyper-Gold: Buy, trade, stake gold backed by real assets. Earn yield while keeping the security of blockchain.

quotes: Using Hyper 0x, we automated meme trades and earned more in 3 days than 3 months of manual trading.
Ox Pay changed how we pay our international team—faster, cheaper, better.

questions.a: A blockchain infrastructure company enabling anyone to earn from consumption: trading, spending, compute, payroll.
It connects wallets, AI agents, social trends, and DEXs to execute yield-generating trades automatically.

questions.q: Can I get paid in crypto using Ox Pay?
questions.a: Yes, Ox Pay supports on-chain payroll globally.
